item.title: @elonmusk: üá∞üá∑ SOUTH KOREAN SHIPPING GIANT SWITCHES ENTIRE FLEET TO STARLINK Korea Line Corp, the shipping branc...
item.description: üá∞üá∑ SOUTH KOREAN SHIPPING GIANT SWITCHES ENTIRE FLEET TO STARLINK Korea Line Corp, the shipping branch of SM Group, wrapped up installing Starlink on every single one of their 38 ships, bulk carriers, and LNG tankers alike. They're the first in South Korea's shipping scene to fully switch over. Now they've got lightning-fast data transfers, smoother ship-to-office comms, smarter operations, better navigation safety, and way happier crews on those epic voyages. Source:@serobinsonjr

item.title: @elonmusk: Starlink is quickly emerging as the go to inflight connectivity solution for airlines globally. Unit...
item.description: Starlink is quickly emerging as the go to inflight connectivity solution for airlines globally. United Airlines Emirates Air France British Airways Qatar Airways Korean Air Asiana Airlines Alaska Airlines Virgin Atlantic WestJet SAS Scandinavian Airlines Iberia Aer Lingus Vueling LEVEL flydubai airBaltic Jin Air ZIPAIR Tokyo Air Busan Air Seoul JSX Hawaiian Airlines Air Canada Any airline not using Starlink is falling behind.
